thread.title: Mediagrif publishes results on shareholders votes for the election of its directors

title: Mediagrif publishes results on shareholders votes for the election of its directors
text:
Mediagrif publishes results on shareholders votes for the election of its directors 
TSX: MDF 
www.mediagrif.com 
LONGUEUIL, QC, Sept. 18, 2015 /CNW Telbec/ - Mediagrif Interactive Technologies Inc. (TSX: MDF), a world-leading operator of e-commerce solutions, publishes today the results of the shareholders vote for the election of directors during its annual general meeting held Tuesday, September 15, 2015 . 
10,868,928 shares (approximately 71.86% of the common shares issued and outstanding) were represented in person or by proxy at the meeting. All nominees were duly elected on the Board of Directors of Mediagrif by a majority of the votes cast by the shareholders present or represented by proxy. 
The proxies received by management for the election of directors were as follows:
